Class NameServer

java.lang.Object
  org.restlet.Uniform
      org.restlet.Restlet
          org.restlet.Application
              NameServer

public class NameServer
extends org.restlet.Application

The main entry point in the name server application. This implements the /devices resource to keep a list of online devices. It uses the DevicesResource class.

Author:
Mamta

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
The main routine for nameserver. It takes the listening port from command line argument, which defaults to 2500.
